channel.title: Need help getting other people to connect to server using Beyond RSC source
channel.description:
Im using beyond rsc source and I cannot get other people to log in. I already port forwarded on my router.
In conf/server/conf.xml what do I change the ip and lsip to? is it my external ip, defualt gateway, or my computer's ip
In other posts it says I need to change the IP in server.java but I do not see any IP's in the file.
Can someone help me? I need to know just server side

item.title: Need help getting other people to connect to server using Beyond RSC source
item.dc:creator: @moparboyrunescape moparboyrunescape
item.description:
@moparboyrunescape wrote:

for both of the areas in conf.xml?

edit i put localhost both areas in conf.xml and no luck

Read full topic
